test_strategy_covers_all_types.detail: Spec Validation (14 tests), Regression (8 tests), Structural Parity (4 tests) = 26 total. Performance and security N/A for spec-only fix. E2E N/A (agent markdown changes not runtime-testable).

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.detail: All 6 FRs (FR-001 through FR-006) with all 8 ACs covered. CON-002 backward compatibility covered by 6 regression tests. CON-003 API preservation covered by 2 regression tests.

traceability_matrix_complete.detail: 100% requirement coverage: 8 ACs mapped to 26 test cases across 14 SV + 8 RT + 4 SS. 26 rows in traceability matrix. No orphan requirements.

coverage_targets_defined.detail: 100% AC coverage, 100% regression coverage for finalize behavior, structural parity across Jira/GitHub/BACKLOG sync sections.

test_data_strategy_documented.detail: test-data-plan.md documents boundary values (9 entries), invalid inputs (12 entries), max-size inputs (3 file size entries), and 16 specification pattern definitions (10 required + 6 preserved).

critical_paths_identified.detail: 4 critical paths: orchestrator finalize BACKLOG.md path, graceful degradation paths (no file/no match/malformed), non-interference with Jira/GitHub sync, trivial tier T8 path.

require_failing_test_first.detail: 10 of 26 tests FAIL pre-fix (SV-01, SV-02, SV-04, SV-09, SV-11, SV-12, SV-14, SS-01, SS-02, SS-03). 17 pass (regression + SV tests matching existing nested content). Fix workflow test-first requirement satisfied.

article_II.detail: 26 test cases designed in Phase 05 before implementation. 10 tests fail pre-fix confirming test-first workflow. Test scaffold written to src/claude/hooks/tests/test-bug-0033-backlog-finalize-spec.test.cjs.

article_VII.detail: Traceability matrix maps all 8 ACs to test cases. 100% coverage confirmed by cross-checking every AC in requirements-spec.md against matrix.

article_IX.detail: All required artifacts present: test-strategy.md, test-cases.md, test-data-plan.md, traceability-matrix.csv, test scaffold .cjs, gate validation JSON.

article_XI.detail: No integration test applicable. This is a specification-only fix to markdown agent files. BACKLOG.md operations are agent-directed behaviors, not programmatic code paths.
